channel.title: Yelp on Tristan's website
channel.description: Recent content in Yelp on Tristan's website

item.title: Sunday data/statistics link roundup (6/10)
item.description: Yelp put a data set online for people to play with, including reviews, star ratings, etc. This could be a really neat data set for a student project. The data they have made available focuses on the area around 30 universities. My alma mater is one of them.Â A sort of goofy talk about how to choose the optimal marriage partner when viewing the problem as an optimal stopping problem.
